// Basic transaction with function
store.transact((value) => {
  // Multiple operations here
  this.$.updateUser(userId, newData)
  this.$.logActivity('user updated')
  this.$.sendNotification(userId)
})

// Transaction with parameters object
store.transact({
  suspendValidation: true,  // Allow invalid intermediate states
  action(value) {
    // Complex multi-step operation
    this.$.processPayment(amount)
    this.$.updateInventory(productId, -quantity)
    this.$.createOrder(orderData)
  }
})
